title: Stress, hazardous drinking and intimate partner aggression in a diverse sample of women and their partners
explanation: The text discusses a historical gendered perspective in IPA research, framing women as victims and men as perpetrators. This directly relates to power dynamics and social roles, indicating a political context.

title: Alcohol, minority stress, and intimate partner violence: Temporal and prospective associations in sexual minority young adults
explanation: The term "victims" is used to refer to individuals who experience negative health outcomes as a result of intimate partner violence (IPV), a topic being studied scientifically. This aligns with a technical and research-oriented context.
